盰字的基本解释

盰
gàn
目多露眼白。
张目。

盰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gàn］
［《廣韻》古案切，去翰，見。］
张开；裂开。

盰字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　盰； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页799第13
【唐韻】【集韻】?古旱切，干上聲。【說文】目多白也。　又張目也。【白虎通】盰目?兵，天下富昌。　又人名。【後漢·西羌傳】隴西太守劉盰。　又【廣韻】古按切【集韻】【韻會】居案切【正韻】古汗切，?干去聲。義同。

盰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
盰字的起名意思

暂无。

盰
Basic explanation of words
盰
gàn
Many eyes are white.
Zhang Mu.
盰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gàn］
["Guangyun" ancient case cut, go to Han, see you. ]
Open; crack open.
盰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　盰; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 799 13
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient dry cut, dry sound. [Said the text] The head is too white.　 Zhang Mu also. 【Baihutong】Baomu? Soldiers, the world is rich and prosperous.　Another name. [Later Han·Xi Qiang Biography] Longxi prefect Liu Yan.　[Guangyun] Ancient press cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Juan cut [Zhengyun] Ancient Han cut, go dry. The same meaning.
